segments.text: Can you tell me what the unit price of such carpet is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , here is the catalogue and the price list . You can have a look . We also have many other kinds of carpets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The price seems acceptable for me . But I want to check whether you can supply the carpets now if we order some ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course we can . We can provide the quantity you ask for .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's very good . Shall we sign a contract now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Let's check the terms of contract .
segments.speaker: S2
